

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

flights = pd.read_csv("flights.csv")


month_counts = flights.groupby('month').size().reset_index(name='count')


print(month_counts)


plt.bar(month_counts['month'], month_counts['count'])
plt.xlabel('Month')
plt.ylabel('Number of Flights')
plt.title('Number of Flights per Month')
plt.show()
plt.savefig("flights.png")
import os
os.system("start flights.png")

print(month_counts.to_markgown())
